title: Bi-Indoushi Miija: Injoku no Gakuen (Mija Beautifull Demon)
synopsis: A pentagram appears in the school grounds of St. Moses Academy, and the demon of lust Mija is unleashed into the world to resurrect the dark paradise on earth once more. Her role is to covert humans to her debauchery... to reveal the hidden lusts and carnal pleasures to her human converts.
